auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.

tasks.allTasksSorted: All your tasks, sorted by status
tasks.dragToUpdate: Drag tasks between columns to update status
tasks.noTasks: No tasks yet. Add one above to get started.
tasks.archiveConfirm: will be deleted. This cannot be undone.
tasks.dailyTooltip: This task will reset to active on your list every midnight.

settings.title: Settings
settings.flowIntervalsDesc: Configure focus duration ranges and their corresponding break times.
settings.soundDesc: Choose the sound to play when break ends.

notes.tooltip: Jot down ideas during your focus session. Notes are stored in your browser, not tied to your account.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Personal insights generated from your focus data
analytics.notEnoughData: Not enough data yet — this analysis is still forming.
analytics.noSessions: No sessions recorded yet. Use the timer to create sessions.

flowWaves.title: Daily Flow Waves
flowWaves.tooltip: Sessions from the last 14 days are grouped by hour. Hours >30% above average are 'Peak', >30% below are 'Trough'.

depthScore.title: Depth Score
depthScore.tooltip: Each session is weighted: <25min → ×0.5, 25-50min → ×1.0, >50min → ×1.25. Today's total is compared to last week's same-day average.

focusDensity.title: Focus Density
focusDensity.tooltip: Today's total focus time divided by the time span from first to last session. ≥80% Sharp, ≥60% Good, ≥40% Scattered Start, <40% Scattered Mind.

resistancePoint.title: Resistance Point
resistancePoint.tooltip: Mode and median of all session durations are calculated. If they differ by >20%, median is used. This shows the minute you typically take a break.
resistancePoint.usuallyAt: You usually take a break at minute {{minute}}.

earnedFreedom.title: Earned Freedom
earnedFreedom.tooltip: For every 5 minutes of focus, you earn 1 minute of break. Used break time is subtracted to show your remaining balance.
earnedFreedom.weekSummary: This week: earned {{earned}} min, used {{used}} min.

flowWindow.title: Natural Flow Window
flowWindow.tooltip: All sessions are bucketed into 5-min intervals. The best consecutive 2-3 buckets form the 'dominant window'. Median duration is also shown.
flowWindow.windowText: Your focus window is usually {{start}}-{{end}} minutes.

flowStreak.title: Flow Streak
flowStreak.tooltip: A day counts as 'filled' if your depth score exceeds 50% of your 30-day average. Consecutive filled days make up your streak.

taskHarmony.title: Task-Flow Harmony
taskHarmony.tooltip: Task-tagged sessions are grouped. Weighted depth score and session count are calculated per task. Deepest tasks appear first.

warmup.title: Warm-up Phase
warmup.tooltip: 22% of the average duration of 20+ minute sessions is estimated as warm-up time. If coefficient of variation >0.6, data is considered unreliable.
warmup.avgText: Your average warm-up time is {{minutes}} minutes.
warmup.improved: Decreased by {{minutes}} min compared to last month.
warmup.worsened: Increased by {{minutes}} min compared to last month.
